description.narrative: Girls and boys access safe and secure education and critical information for their own well-being, which contributes to Child Protection And Emergencies, Education In Emergencies, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: The Government of Ukraine's response to cthe conflict in Eastern Ukraine is supported through interventions in Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH), Child Protection, Education and Health sectors
